text: Ravne pri Šmartnem () is a dispersed settlement of isolated farmsteads above the Tuhinj Valley in the Municipality of Kamnik in the Upper Carniola region of Slovenia. ==Name== The name of the settlement was changed from Ravne to Ravne pri Šmartnem in 1953.Spremembe naselij 1948–95. 1996. Database. Ljubljana: Geografski inštitut ZRC SAZU, DZS. ==References== ==External links== *Ravne pri Šmartnem at Geopedia Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Kamnik
title: Ravne pri Šmartnem
